body.section:
Part 1 will consist of your giving information and opinions. The topic you talk about in Part 2 will be the sort of thing everybody can say something about, eg the media, pollution, or technology.
Now look at the task our candidates are next asked to do.
Describe the technological device that you find most useful. You should say:- why you got it- what you use it for- what advantages and disadvantages it has and- explain how it has changed your lifestyle
What device would you choose to talk about and how would you answer the questions about it? Think about answering these questions before moving on to see what Alexandra said.
